text: قال لم اكن لاسجد لبشر خلقته من صلصل من حما مسنون

translations.translation: He said, 'I will not prostrate to a human being whom You have created out of dried clay formed from fetid black mud.'
How could I bow," said he, "before a mortal whom You created from fermented clay dried tingling hard?"
He said: "It does not behove of me to prostrate myself before a human being whom You have created out of dry ringing clay wrought from black mud."
Iblis replied, "I did not want to prostrate before a human being whom You have created out of mud-moulded clay".
He answered, “It does not befit me to prostrate myself to a human whom You have created from sounding clay made out of black smelly mud.”
[Iblis] said: "I am not one to prostrate myself to a human, whom You created from dried (sounding) clay of altered mud."
He said: I am not such that I should make obeisance to a mortal whom Thou hast created of the essence of black mud fashioned in shape.
Said he, 'I would never bow myself before a mortal whom Thou hast created of a clay of mud moulded.'
He said: I am not one to prostrate myself unto a mortal whom Thou hast created out of potter's clay of black mud altered!
He replied, "I am not one to prostrate myself to a man whom You have created out of a clay of moulded mud."
He said it was not for me that should prostrate myself unto a human being whom Thou hast created from ringing clay of loam moulded.
Said he, ‘I will not prostrate before a human whom You have created out of a dry clay [drawn] from an aging mud.’
(Iblis) said: "I am not one to prostrate myself to man, whom Thou didst create from sounding clay, from mud moulded into shape."
[Iblis (Satan)] said: "I am not the one to prostrate myself to a human being, whom You created from sounding clay of altered black smooth mud."
He replied: 'I will not prostrate to a mortal You have created of clay, from molded mud'
He said, “I am not about to prostrate myself before a human being, whom You created from clay, from molded mud.”
He said, "Never would I prostrate to a human whom You created out of clay from an altered black mud."
[15:33] Said he, ‘I was not about to prostrate myself, I should not prostrate myself, before a mortal whom You have created out of a dry clay [drawn] from malleable mud’.
(He said: Why should I prostrate myself unto a mortal whom Thou hast created out of potter's clay of black mud altered?) he said: it is not becoming of me to prostrate to clay.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { قَالَ } إبليس محتجاً على الله، طالباً للرجحان والمزية على سبيل الإنكار والتعريض: { لَمْ أَكُن } أي: لم يصح مني، ولم يستحسن عني، ولم يلق لمرتبتي { لأَسْجُدَ لِبَشَرٍ } جسماني ظلماني كثيف { خَلَقْتَهُ مِن صَلْصَالٍ } أكشف وأظلم منه، وأخذت الصلصال { مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ } [الحجر: 33] لا شيء أظلم منه وأبعد عن ساحة عز القبول، والتمثالُ المشتمل على هذه الظلمات المتراكمة لا يليق أن يَخضع ويسجد له الروحاني النوراني

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
قال تعالى: { يا إبليس ما لكَ } أي شيء عرض لك، { ألا تكونَ مع الساجدين } لآدم؟ { قال لم أكن لأسجُدَ } أي: لا يصح مني، بل ينافي حالي أن أسجد { لبشرٍ } جسماني كثيف، وأنا روحاني لطيف، وقد { خلقتَه من صلصالٍ من حمإ مسنونٍ } ، وهو أخس العناصر، وخلقتني من نار وهي أشرفها
 استنقص آدم من جهة الأصل، وغفل عن الكمالات التي خصه الله بها، منها: أنه خلقه بيديه بلا واسطة، أي: بيد القدرة والحكمة، بخلاف غيره، ومنها: أنه خصه بالعلوم التي لم توجد عند غيره من الملائكة، ومنها: أنه نفخ فيه من روحه المضافة إلى نفسه، ومنها: أنه جعله خليفة في أرضه


 إلى غيره ذلك من الخواص التي تشرف بها فاستحق السجود
